General.Name: Delivra Health Brands Inc
General.Description: Delivra Health Brands Inc. through its subsidiaries, provides lifestyle and wellness products to consumers and patients in regulated markets worldwide. It is involved in selling of cannabis, liquid sleep shots, sleep powder packets, and pain relief creams. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 999 Canada Place, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3E2
